      Methods in com.emitrom.flash4j.core.client.geom that return ColorTransform 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ColorTransform Transform.getColorTransform()
      Gets a ColorTransform object containing values that universally adjust the colors in the display object.
      ColorTransform Transform.getConcatenatedColorTransform()
      Gets the concatenated color transform.
      Methods in com.emitrom.flash4j.core.client.geom with parameters of type ColorTransform 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ColorTransform.concat(ColorTransform second)
      Concatenates the ColorTranform object specified by the second parameter with the current ColorTransform object and sets the current object as the result, which is an additive combination of the two color transformations.
      void Transform.setColorTransform(ColorTransform value)
      Sets a ColorTransform object containing values that universally adjust the colors in the display object.
